Description:
The M249 Squad Automatic Weapon ('SAW') can store 200 bullets in its clip and you can carry 600 bullets as backpack ammo. Uses [ammo_556](../ammo_556)/[ammo_556clip](../ammo_556clip). CVars:
  • sk_556_bullet# (Default: 15, 15, 25): CVar for M249 SAW damage per bullet.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it. Only 'On' and 'Toggle' trigger use-types are accepted which makes weapon be picked up by player '!activator'. Kill-targeting this entity will remove {{ entname }} and stop it from respawning.
Entity to trigger when weapon is picked up. Trigger use-type is 'Toggle'.
Entity to remove when weapon is picked up.

Notes: As all weapon-, ammo- and item- entities, this respawns after 15 seconds.

If "TOUCH only" and "USE only" flags are selected, the weapon can only be collected by trigger. When those flags are not selected, the weapon also can be collected by trigger, but only if player is the !activator.
